translation.title: Title
translation.aboutp1:
Thanks for using our app.
With this app you can do all sorts of exercises.
On the bottom of the screen you can see four tabs.
The first one is for the exercises.
The second one is for achievements.
The third one is the QR code scanner.
The fourth one is the about page. (the page you're reading right now)
translation.aboutp2:
For help, you can send us an email at lau.kosters@gmail.com
To help us out, please leave a tip: paypal.me/laura16727
